\[\begin{tikzcd}
	\textcolor{rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,214}{\dF\cR^{*}.\cR\dH} &&&& \dH \\
	\\
	&& \textcolor{rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}{\dG\cR^{*}.\cR\dH} \\
	\dF &&&& \dX \\
	\\
	&& \dG
	\arrow["\cR"', from=6-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow["\lambda"', from=4-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "\cR"{pos=0.6}, from=4-1, to=4-5]
	\arrow["{\cR^{*}}", from=1-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,92;green,92;blue,214}, from=3-3, to=6-3]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,214}, from=1-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,214}, from=1-1, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\lambda^{\#}}", curve={height=-12pt}, shorten <=4pt, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, from=6-3, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}\]
